vote.title: Authorize a three-year contract with West Publishing Corporation d/b/a West, a Thomson Reuters business, for on-line legal research and associated services utilizing Westlaw for the City Attorney's Office through the Texas Department of Information Resources for the period beginning March 1, 2022 through February 28, 2025 - Not to exceed $626,447.16 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
